title: AirPrint and AirPlay Certification Quality Engineer
summary: Imagine what you could do here! At Apple, new insights have a way of becoming extraordinary products, services, and customer experiences very quickly. Do you bring passion and dedication to your job? If so, we are looking for individuals like you. The Connected Media Team is looking for a creative, organized and hardworking QA Engineer with experience working with consumer printers who can join the team responsible for certification of AirPrint, Apple’s AirPlay Video and AirPlay Audio technologies on 3rd-Party products. The ideal candidate will have experience verifying specification compliance, communication with 3rd-Party engineering teams, and demonstrated expertise isolating hard-to-diagnose bugs. description: This role will include creation and execution of quality test plans of 3rd-Party HW/SW solutions that integrate closely with Apple’s AirPrint technology, while occasionally assisting with some of the other technologies we support. Job responsibilities will include validation of vendor certification program results, OS updates, bug investigations, and the ongoing development of test tools. This role involves writing and supervising high-quality bug reports, reporting on project progress, documentation, and risk analysis. You will be able to adapt to changing tasks ranging from test-lab focused QA to configuration setup and hard-to-reproduce bug investigations. This position requires a self-motivated individual with strong analytical, problem-solving, testing, and interpersonal skills who can deliver in a fast-paced environment. You can work well in isolation and with teammates spread around the world.
preferred_qualifications: Experience with AirPlay video and audio devices, Proficiency in Objective-C and Swift programming languages, Experience with Xcode and XCUITests
